channel.title: Blogging on Golden Blog-A-Thon
channel.description: Recent content in Blogging on Golden Blog-A-Thon

item.title: It's All According To Plan (but not mine)
item.description: It seems that the tooling was there, I am just not well versed in Google Fu. The Value Train is Coming! Welcome one and all! Value for Value is here in blog land and it was right before our eyes. It seems the tooling was there, I am just not well versed in Google-Fu! BeardedTek has figured out how to get boosts working (WITH A MODAL SCREEN!!!) with Alby. This is very exciting, as it seems that with this same tooling, I can get the BTCPayServer going with this modal button as well.
